about_the_game:
One More Hound! is a hand-draw wave-combat game by a solo developer. Survive against waves of enemies with unique characteristics, and beat your own records one round after another!
Try the Demo, give me a feedback, wishlist it and wait for the full game with more enemies and levels!


After been teleported by a mysterious creature to this Galatic arena, you will need to fight to survive round after round to see your love-one again!
Curerntly your demo-Records won't appear in the game full version.
